attributes.action: Funding package for high risk workers to help them while self isolating
attributes.additional_details:
The government has advised high risk and elderly to stay at home and self isolate however a large number of high risk people are workers whether it be full or part time however the support the government has offered is to workers whose business is struggling to keep them on. 

What about high risk workers who work for businesses that are not struggling and are still having to go to work and put there health at risk as if they don't go to work they can't survive financially
attributes.background: Come up with support for high risk workers who are trying to self isolate as advised by government but are unable to do so due to lack of finact support by the government.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
